datafield.subfield: Angular analysis of the $B^{0} \to K^{*0} \mu^{+} \mu^{-}$ decay using 3 fb$^{-1}$ of integrated luminosity
First observation of the rare $B^{+}\to D^{+} K^{+} \pi^{-}$ decay
Measurements of long-range near-side angular correlations in $\sqrt{s_{\text{NN}}}=5$TeV proton-lead collisions in the forward region
Search for the lepton-flavour violating decay $D^0 \to e^\pm\mu^\mp$
Measurement of forward W and Z boson production in $pp$ collisions at $ \sqrt{s}=8 $ TeV
First observation of the decay $D^{0}\rightarrow K^{-}\pi^{+}\mu^{+}\mu^{-}$ in the $\rho^{0}$-$\omega$ region of the dimuon mass spectrum
Production of associated Y and open charm hadrons in pp collisions at $ \sqrt{s}=7 $ and 8 TeV via double parton scattering
Search for the rare decays $B^{0}\to J/\psi \gamma$ and $B^{0}_{s} \to J/\psi \gamma$
Evidence for the strangeness-changing weak decay $\Xi_b^-\to\Lambda_b^0\pi^-$
Measurements of prompt charm production cross-sections in $pp$ collisions at $ \sqrt{s}=13 $ TeV
Model-independent measurement of mixing parameters in D$^{0}$ → K$_{S}^{0}$ π$^{+}$π$^{−}$ decays
Measurement of the forward-backward asymmetry in $Z/\gamma^{\ast} \rightarrow \mu^{+}\mu^{-}$ decays and determination of the effective weak mixing angle
Studies of the resonance structure in $D^0\to K^0_S K^{\pm}\pi^{\mp}$ decays
Forward production of $\Upsilon$ mesons in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=7$ and 8TeV
Measurement of forward $J/\psi$ production cross-sections in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=13$ TeV
First measurement of the differential branching fraction and $C\!P$ asymmetry of the $B^\pm\to\pi^\pm\mu^+\mu^-$ decay
Measurement of CP violation parameters and polarisation fractions in $ {\mathrm{B}}_{\mathrm{s}}^0\to \mathrm{J}/\psi {\overline{\mathrm{K}}}^{\ast 0} $ decays
Study of the production of $\Lambda_b^0$ and $\overline{B}^0$ hadrons in $pp$ collisions and first measurement of the $\Lambda_b^0\rightarrow J/\psi pK^-$ branching fraction
Measurement of the time-integrated $CP$ asymmetry in $D^0 \to K^0_S K^0_S$ decays
Search for hidden-sector bosons in $B^0 \!\to K^{*0}\mu^+\mu^-$ decays
Measurement of the $B_s^0 \to \phi \phi$ branching fraction and search for the decay $B^0 \to \phi \phi$
$B$ flavour tagging using charm decays at the LHCb experiment
Measurement of the branching fraction ratio $\mathcal{B}(B_c^+ \rightarrow \psi(2S)\pi^+)/\mathcal{B}(B_c^+ \rightarrow J/\psi \pi^+)$
Observation of $J/\psi p$ Resonances Consistent with Pentaquark States in $\Lambda_b^0 \to J/\psi K^- p$ Decays
First observation of the decay B$_{s}^{0}$ → K$_{S}^{0}$ K$^{∗}$(892)$^{0}$ at LHCb
Search for long-lived heavy charged particles using a ring imaging Cherenkov technique at LHCb
Angular analysis and differential branching fraction of the decay $B^0_s\to\phi\mu^+\mu^-$
Measurement of the ratio of branching fractions $\mathcal{B}(\bar{B}^0 \to D^{*+}\tau^{-}\bar{\nu}_{\tau})/\mathcal{B}(\bar{B}^0 \to D^{*+}\mu^{-}\bar{\nu}_{\mu})$
First observation of top quark production in the forward region
Measurement of the exclusive Υ production cross-section in pp collisions at $ \sqrt{s}=7 $ TeV and 8 TeV
Study of $B^{-}\to DK^-\pi^+\pi^-$ and $B^-\to D\pi^-\pi^+\pi^-$ decays and determination of the CKM angle $\gamma$
Measurement of the forward $Z$ boson production cross-section in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=7$ TeV
Study of $W$ boson production in association with beauty and charm
Search for the $\Lambda^0_b \rightarrow \Lambda \eta^\prime$ and $\Lambda^0_b \rightarrow \Lambda \eta$ decays with the LHCb detector
Identification of beauty and charm quark jets at LHCb
Quantum numbers of the $X(3872)$ state and orbital angular momentum in its $\rho^0 J\psi$ decay
A study of $CP$ violation in $B^\mp \rightarrow Dh^\mp$ ($h=K,\pi$) with the modes $D \rightarrow K^\mp \pi^\pm \pi^0$, $D \rightarrow \pi^+\pi^-\pi^0$ and $D \rightarrow K^+K^-\pi^0$
Determination of the quark coupling strength $|V_{ub}|$ using baryonic decays
First observation and measurement of the branching fraction for the decay $B^0_s \to D_s^{*\mp} K^{\pm}$
Observation of the $B^0 \to \rho^0 \rho^0$ decay from an amplitude analysis of $B^0 \to (\pi^+\pi^-)(\pi^+\pi^-)$ decays
Differential branching fraction and angular analysis of $\Lambda^{0}_{b} \rightarrow \Lambda \mu^+\mu^-$ decays
Measurement of $CP$ violation in $B^0 \rightarrow J/\psi K^0_S$ decays
Measurement of the time-dependent CP asymmetries in $B_s^0\rightarrow J/\psi K_{\rm S}^0$
Measurement of $CP$ asymmetries and polarisation fractions in $B_s^0 \rightarrow K^{*0}\bar{K}{}^{*0}$ decays
First observation and amplitude analysis of the $B^{-}\to D^{+}K^{-}\pi^{-}$ decay
Measurement of forward $\rm Z\rightarrow e^+e^-$ production at $\sqrt{s}=8$ TeV
Precise measurements of the properties of the $B_1(5721)^{0,+}$ and $B^\ast_2(5747)^{0,+}$ states and observation of $B^{+,0}\pi^{-,+}$ mass structures
Measurement of indirect $CP$ asymmetries in $D^0\rightarrow K^-K^+$ and $D^0\rightarrow \pi^-\pi^+$ decays using semileptonic $B$ decays
Angular analysis of the $B^{0} \to K^{*0} e^{+} e^{−}$ decay in the low-q$^{2}$ region
